title: 2026 NFL Honors live updates: AP NFL award winners, MVP, start time
desc: The NFL MVP and the winners of the other AP NFL awards will be announced at the NFL Honors tonight, ahead of Super Bowl 60. Finalists include Christian McCaffrey, Josh Allen, Trevor Lawrence, Drake Maye and Matthew Stafford.

title: Jalisco issues health alert over measles outbreak in World Cup host
desc: The Mexican state of Jalisco has issued a health alert and mandated face masks in schools due to a measles outbreak in the state capital.
